resources.string:
Full configuration will contain all mesh network data stored on this device.

When sharing with a Guest, consider creating a new network key and set of guest application keys, send them to nodes that you want to share with the guest, and bind to required models. Then export only this network key with excluded device keys. 

The underlying library allows also to specify which nodes, groups or scenes are to be shared. This app will only share those, that use the specified network key.
Device keys allow nodes to be reconfigured or reset (removed from the network).
